title: King Charles Returns to London Ahead of Surgery for Enlarged Prostate
description: King Charles is back in London. The monarch, 75, traveled over 100 miles from the royal residence at Sandringham back to London on Thursday ahead of his surgery for an enlarged prostate scheduled for this week. Photos published by The Sun showed that King Charles arrived by helicopter before being driven to Buckingham Palace.
